normalised: Film Fest Season is Officially ON, Yaar!

unnormalised: Film Fest Season is Officially ON, Yaar!
normalised: Forget I P L for a bit, folks. It's film festival season and the buzz is R E A L! From the Jio M A M I Mumbai Film Festival preps to whispers of exciting independent flicks premiering at the International Film Festival of Kerala (I F F K) this December, movie buffs are in for a treat.

unnormalised: Forget IPL for a bit, folks. It's film festival season and the buzz is REAL! From the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival preps to whispers of exciting independent flicks premiering at the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK) this December, movie buffs are in for a treat.
normalised: Word on the street is that this year's lineup is packed with powerful stories and stunning visuals. We're talking potential Oscar nominees, hidden indie gems, and maybe even a Bollywood surprise or two.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that this year's lineup is packed with powerful stories and stunning visuals. We're talking potential Oscar nominees, hidden indie gems, and maybe even a Bollywood surprise or two.
normalised: Plus, who doesn't love a good film festival after-party? Think spicy biryani under the stars and endless discussions about the meaning of life (or at least, the movie we just watched).

unnormalised: Plus, who doesn't love a good film festival after-party? Think spicy biryani under the stars and endless discussions about the meaning of life (or at least, the movie we just watched).
normalised: I F F K applications close on the thirty first! So, if you're a budding filmmaker from, say, Chennai or a film student from F T I I, Pune, get those submissions in. Rupee five hundred could be your ticket to fame (or at least a few good networking sessions).

unnormalised: IFFK applications close on the 31st! So, if you're a budding filmmaker from, say, Chennai or a film student from FTII, Pune, get those submissions in. Rs. 500 could be your ticket to fame (or at least a few good networking sessions).
normalised: Get ready for a cinematic rollercoaster ride! This year's festivals are promising to be extra masala-filled and deliciously entertaining. Don't miss out!

unnormalised: Get ready for a cinematic rollercoaster ride! This year's festivals are promising to be extra masala-filled and deliciously entertaining. Don't miss out!
